text:
@senatemajldr You are wrong, wrong and wrong.

Here are the 3 crises facing our country:
1. COVID19. Until the virus is contained, you cannot reopen schools or restart the economy.
2. Economic support for 50 million Americans who are jobless.
3. Trump & Barr making a mockery of law and order.
